text: @ByronYork @henryolsenEPPC Not true. Trump knew enough about the risk of Covid19 to restrict travel from China on Jan 31st. For the next 6 weeks he publicly downplayed the risk & did nothing to slow the spread or prepare for a public health crisis. Trump was acquitted without a trial on Feb 5th. #COVID19
